title: Provide Information on Child Policy
description: A parent wants to know if there are any height restrictions for the main roller coaster at a theme park.

tasks.description: Identify the specific attraction (main roller coaster) and the query (height restriction).
Retrieve the attraction's details from the information system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the ride details, which include a minimum height requirement of 54 inches.

tasks.description: Clearly communicate the height restriction to the parent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately states the minimum height requirement.
